attributes.action: The Life time ISA is age discrimination as it is only open to people under 40
attributes.background: The Life Time ISA can only be opened by those between 18 to 39. The account offers a government bonus of 25% up to a maximum £1000 per a year. The ISA is admirable as it is designed to encourage the young to save towards a home deposit or retirement. But what about us oldies over 40, I want my bonus

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You can find out more about the current eligibility and other rules for the Lifetime ISA here:

https://www.gov.uk/lifetime-isa

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
